description: The user right-clicked on an empty area of the desktop.
The user clicked on "Properties" from the context menu.
The user clicked on the "Screen Saver" tab.
The user clicked on the dropdown menu for the screen saver option.
The user selected "None" from the dropdown menu.
The user clicked on the "Apply" button.
The user clicked on the "Power" button.
The user clicked on the dropdown menu for the "Turn off hard disks" setting.
The user selected "After 4 hours" from the dropdown menu.
The user clicked on the "OK" button.
The user clicked on the "OK" button.
